name: part_006
file: tmp_【ゲスト多数！新髪型お披露目！】昭和老人会♪宝鐘マリン3周年記念歌謡祭【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [3LaDuoHDC_g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Oozora Subaru performing the song 'Hatsukoi' in a duet.
MC section with Ookami Mio and Shirakami Fubuki discussing the previous song performance and childhood memories.
Inugami Korone, Shirogane Noel, Houshou Marine, and Yukihana Lamy performing the song 'Gakuen Tengoku'.

subtitles.original: 好きだよと言えずに 初恋は
subtitles.english: Without being able to say "I love you," first love is...

subtitles.original: ふりこ細工の心
subtitles.english: A heart like a pendulum mechanism

subtitles.original: 放課後の校庭を 走る君がいた
subtitles.english: There you were, running across the schoolyard after school

subtitles.original: 遠くで僕は いつでも君を探してた
subtitles.english: From afar, I was always looking for you

subtitles.original: 浅い夢だから 胸をはなれない
subtitles.english: Because it's a shallow dream, it won't leave my heart

subtitles.original: 夕映えはあんず色
subtitles.english: The evening glow is the color of apricots

subtitles.original: 帰り道一人 口笛吹いて
subtitles.english: Walking home alone, whistling a tune

subtitles.original: 名前さえ呼べなくて
subtitles.english: Unable to even call out your name

subtitles.original: とらわれた心 見つめていたよ
subtitles.english: My captivated heart was gazing at you

subtitles.original: 好きだよと言えずに 初恋は
subtitles.english: Without being able to say "I love you," first love is...

subtitles.original: ふりこ細工の心
subtitles.english: A heart like a pendulum mechanism

subtitles.original: 風に舞った花びらが 水面を乱すように
subtitles.english: Like petals dancing in the wind, disturbing the water's surface

subtitles.original: 愛という字書いてみては ふるえてたあの頃
subtitles.english: Trying to write the word "love," I was trembling back then

subtitles.original: 浅い夢だから 胸をはなれない
subtitles.english: Because it's a shallow dream, it won't leave my heart

subtitles.original: 放課後の校庭を 走る君がいた
subtitles.english: There you were, running across the schoolyard after school

subtitles.original: 遠くで僕は いつでも君を探してた
subtitles.english: From afar, I was always looking for you

subtitles.original: 浅い夢だから 胸をはなれない
subtitles.english: Because it's a shallow dream, it won't leave my heart

subtitles.original: 胸をはなれない
subtitles.english: It won't leave my heart

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン、大空スバルで「初恋」でした。
subtitles.english: That was Houshou Marine and Oozora Subaru with "Hatsukoi."

subtitles.original: いや、とても甘酸っぱい雰囲気でしたね。
subtitles.english: Man, that was a very bittersweet atmosphere.

subtitles.original: そうですね。こちら企画のまーちゃんとすーくんから来てるそうですね。
subtitles.english: Right. It seems this comes from the Maa-chan and Suu-kun project.

subtitles.original: なるほど。はい。あの企画の中で幼馴染の設定をそのまま曲のコラボで使ったということですね。
subtitles.english: I see. So they used the childhood friend setting from that project for this song collab.

subtitles.original: そうですね。はい。
subtitles.english: Exactly.

subtitles.original: ちなみに、何かこう甘酸っぱい記憶ってありますか？
subtitles.english: By the way, do you have any bittersweet memories?

subtitles.original: 甘酸っぱい記憶ですか？はい。あの、学校帰りに生えている野いちごを食べた時が一番酸っぱかったですね。
subtitles.english: Bittersweet memories? Well, the time I ate wild strawberries on the way home from school was the sourest.

subtitles.original: 甘酸っぱいですねー。
subtitles.english: That's quite bittersweet.

subtitles.original: ※これは実話です
subtitles.english: *This is a true story

subtitles.original: それでは次の曲まいりましょう。
subtitles.english: Now, let's move on to the next song.

subtitles.original: どうぞ。
subtitles.english: Here it is.

subtitles.original: やかましい娘がさらにやかましくなりました。それでは聴いていただきましょう、学園天国。
subtitles.english: The noisy girls have gotten even noisier. Please listen to: Gakuen Tengoku.

subtitles.original: Are you ready? Yeah!
subtitles.english: Are you ready? Yeah!

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: あいつもこいつもあの席を ただ一つねらっているんだよ
subtitles.english: Every one of them is aiming for that one seat

subtitles.original: このクラスで一番の美人の隣を
subtitles.english: The seat right next to the prettiest girl in class

subtitles.original: あー みんなライバルさ
subtitles.english: Ah, everyone's a rival

subtitles.original: あー いのちがけだよ
subtitles.english: Ah, it's a life-or-death struggle

subtitles.original: 運命の女神さまよ このぼくにほほえんで 一度だけでも
subtitles.english: Oh, Goddess of Fate, smile upon me, just this once

subtitles.original: 勉強する気もしない気も この時にかかっているんだよ
subtitles.english: Whether I feel like studying or not depends on this moment

subtitles.original: もし駄目ならこのぼくは もうグレちまうよ
subtitles.english: If it doesn't work out, I'm just gonna become a delinquent
